snippet: St. Louis civic leaders were disappointed by comments from Jones, the Dallas Cowboys’ owner, who said an N.F.L. franchise could move even without approval from the other team owners.
abstract: NFL Roundup; civic leaders in St Louis express disappointment after Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones affirms right of team owners to move teams without league approval; comments could have bearing as St Louis Rams owner Stan Kroenke considers plans to relocate team to Los Angeles; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: St. Louis civic leaders were disappointed by comments from Jones, the Dallas Cowboys’ owner, who said an N.F.L. franchise could move even without approval from the other team owners.

headline.print_headline: St. Louis Dismayed by Jones’s Remarks
headline.main: St. Louis Dismayed by Jerry Jones’s Remarks
